text: "Dulce Amor" () is a song by the American singer Selena. The song was nominated "Song of the Year" at the 1989 Tejano Music Awards. Selena's brother, A.B. Quintanilla III had written the song. It was the lead single from the album of the same name (1988). The songs lyrics are about a girl expressing her emotions about a guy she really loves. The song was mixed with Cumbia music and Jazz fusion. == References == Category:Selena songs Category:Gloria Estefan songs Category:1988 songs
title: Dulce Amor (song)
